_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

GoodsItemItinerary.description: A document providing details relating to a transport service, such as transport movement, identification of equipment and goods, subcontracted service providers, etc.

GoodsItemItinerary.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Details
GoodsItemItinerary.description: A document providing details relating to a transport service, such as transport movement, identification of equipment and goods, subcontracted service providers, etc.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Goods Item Itinerary. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Goods Item Itinerary. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: Identifies a version of a Goods Item Itinerary in order to distinguish updates.

TransportExecutionPlanReferenceID.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Transport Execution Plan Reference. Identifier
TransportExecutionPlanReferenceID.description: The Transport Execution Plan associated with this Goods Item Itinerary.

Signature.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

SenderParty.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Sender_ Party. Party
SenderParty.description: The sender of this Goods Item Itinerary.

ReceiverParty.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Receiver_ Party. Party
ReceiverParty.description: The receiver of this Goods Item Itinerary.

ReferencedConsignment.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Referenced_ Consignment. Consignment
ReferencedConsignment.description: A consignment being transported in the transport service associated with this Goods Item Itinerary.

ReferencedTransportEquipment.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Referenced_ Transport Equipment. Transport Equipment
ReferencedTransportEquipment.description: Transport equipment being transported in the transport service associated with this Goods Item Itinerary.

ReferencedPackage.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Referenced_ Package. Package
ReferencedPackage.description: A package being transported in the transport service associated with this Goods Item Itinerary.

ReferencedGoodsItem.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Referenced_ Goods Item. Goods Item
ReferencedGoodsItem.description: An item of goods being transported in the transport service associated with this Goods Item Itinerary.

TransportationSegment.title: Goods Item Itinerary. Transportation Segment
TransportationSegment.description: A part of a transport service that has its own Transport Execution Plan. A Transportation Segment may cover services other than transport, such as terminal handling, document management, customs procedures, etc.
